name: Energy8
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en:
The Energy8 project pursues an ambitious goal — uniting the fascinating world of games and the progressive technologies of the blockchain industry.
​
The main task of the project is implementation of cryptocurrency and NFT deposit/withdrawal systems into any existing Web2.0 game. Our Energy8 Cryptocurrencies Bridge solution works using a decentralized game node system, based on Proof-Of-Stake mechanism.
